:. about .:
 <a href="
http://www.tothegame.com/pc-3751-the-godfather-for-pc.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.tothegame.com/pc-3751-the-godfather-for-pc.html</a>




.: install :.

1.: Unrar with latest winrar (3.62 or higher) or use 7zip!.

2.: double click: Start-GoDFather.exe ( must be done )

3.: double click: MakeDesktopIcon.exe and start game.



S p e c i a l   I n f o   N o t e :

Some virus-scanner recognize the header of a packed exe 

( Start-GodFather.exe ) as a lame virus, (coz its the byte 

by byte check error of em!.)  Its almost certainly a false

positive alert from overly protective heuristics you can 

read more about in your VirusTool-Manual or VirusToolsWebSite!.

>>>  thank you for reading!.


-ToeD
